articles.title: The world’s largest space telescope finds 2,100 new asteroids. Know what else it can do.
articles.description: Chile’s Vera C. Rubin Observatory has made a groundbreaking discovery, detecting 2,100 new asteroids in just 10 hours. With its powerful 3,200 Megapixel camera, the telescope aims to reshape our understanding of the universe and track potential asteroid threats to Earth.

articles.description: New Delhi, June 27 (IANS) An international team of scientists has developed an artificial intelligence (AI) tool that could revolutionise cancer treatment by mapping cellular diversity within tumours.

articles.title: Microsoft unveils Mu, its small language model for Windows 11 settings: Here's what it does for users
articles.description: The Mu small language model from Microsoft can run locally on a device and allows users to describe what they want to do in the Windows 11 Settings menu. It is built to understand natural language commands and help users navigate the system preferences easily.

articles.title: Sebi proposes 5-point AI rulebook for securities market. Check details
articles.description: Sebi has released a consultation paper proposing a 5-point regulatory framework for the responsible use of AI and ML in Indias securities markets. The guidelines focus on governance, transparency, fairness, data security, and risk controls, aiming to balance innovation with investor protection.

articles.title: Apple brings Journal App to more devices with iPadOS 26 and macOS Tahoe
articles.description: Apple's Journal app, launched in 2023, will expand to iPad and Mac with iPadOS 26 and macOS Tahoe 26. The app will support Apple Pencil, photos, and audio, enhancing the journaling experience while ensuring privacy with end-to-end encryption and Touch ID or Face ID protection.
